productDescription:
Savanna, our classic yet rebellious lady. Our latest adventure and second item of the new Atelier collection. 

The Savanna Hip pack is handmade of high quality leather, this classic lady matches every outfit. The detailed magnetic closure gives this minimalistic looking bag a special twist

This hip pack is perfect for carrying essentials while keeping your hands free. Savanna contains a spare pocket with a zipper on the inside so you can keep your mobile phone, cards, keys and money safe. It has an adjustable leather waist band.

optionalInfo.fit:
Size: 22 cm x 16 cm x 6 cm
Length waist band: adjustable
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
